players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to figure out what could have happened."
You: "Bob, I agree that it's suspicious Diana was targeted. I think we should all share any unusual behavior we've noticed to help narrow down the possibilities."

Charlie: "I agree with both Alice and Bob that it's important to share any unusual behavior we've noticed. I haven't seen anything out of the ordinary from either of you, but I will keep a close eye on things."
You: "Charlie, if you were the detective, did you find anything last night?"
Charlie: "Based on my investigation, I believe that Alice is the mafioso. The evidence I found during the night supports this conclusion."
